their flights, they may avail of Cebu Pacific's flexible options which include free rebooking and travel fund, up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.

data.text:
Other services will operate as planned but please expect that some delays or schedule changes may happen as a result of limited operations.

We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

2. Travel Fund 

Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.) 

3. Refund 

The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

1. Free Rebooking 

               Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

5J 2505/2506 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 2509 Manila – Cebu

5J 140/141 Cebu – Boracay (Caticlan) – Cebu

5J 547 (Oct 26) / 5J 548 (Oct 27) Cebu – Singapore – Cebu

DG 6573/6574 Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu

DG 6066/6067 Cebu – Coron – Cebu

@hey_zelin Hi Hannah. Bern here. As of the moment, your flight 5J226/28OCT PPSCEB is still confirmed. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, visit https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS OR https://t.co/6KpmxsEtqc.

DG 6418/6419 Cebu – Iloilo – Cebu

5J 569/570 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 557/556 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 559/560 Manila – Cebu – Manila

DG 6503/6504 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 2503/2504 Cebu – Manila – Cebu

As a result, the following flights on October 26 are cancelled:

Fight number      Route

DG 6923/6924  Cebu – Butuan – Cebu

DG 6725/6726  Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu

DG 6723/6724  Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu

5J 599/600   Cebu – Davao – Cebu

5J 597/598  Cebu – Davao – Cebu

Cebu Pacific Advisory #7

Cancelled flights on Oct 26 due to limited operations at Mactan Airport

October 25, 2022, 12:30PM

The Mactan Cebu International Airport has resumed partial operations but flights to and from Cebu will be limited from 5am to 5pm. https://t.co/6GvNj6FeyW

Force Majeure means unusual and unforeseeable circumstances beyond the airline's control such as Run-way closure, bird strikes and weather condition. Thank you!

@MaryBulfa1 Hi Mary Jane. Valid ID we accept are ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, and nationality of the guest checking-in such as Company or School ID, passport, or govt-issued ID. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, UMID, PRC ID, PWD ID or OSCA.

data.text:
Other services will operate as planned but please expect that some delays or schedule changes may happen as a result of limited operations.

We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

2. Travel Fund 

Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.) 

3. Refund 

The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

1. Free Rebooking 

               Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.

5J 2505/2506 Manila – Cebu – Manila

Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

5J 225/226 Cebu – Puerto Princesa – Cebu

DG 6418/6419 Cebu – Iloilo – Cebu

DG 6723/6724 Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu

5J 6503/6504 Manila – Cebu – Manila

DG 6984/6985 Cebu – Clark – Cebu

5J 599/600 Cebu – Davao – Cebu

5J 557/556 Manila – Cebu – Manila

As a result, the following flights are cancelled:

Flight Number Route

DG 6066/6067 Cebu – Coron – Cebu

DG 6923/6924 Cebu – Butuan – Cebu

5J 2501/2502 Manila – Cebu – Manila

5J 140/141 Cebu – Boracay (Caticlan) – Cebu

DG 6573/6574 Cebu – Tacloban – Cebu

Cebu Pacific Advisory #6

Cancelled flights on Oct 25 due to limited operations at Mactan Airport

October 24, 2022, 8:00PM https://t.co/FrnJ9cuAuu

data.text: For those travelling up to October 25 and who wish to voluntarily postpone their flights, they may avail of Cebu Pacific's flexible options which include free rebooking and travel fund, up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure.

data.text: We urge passengers travelling to and from Cebu to avoid going to the airport unless they have confirmed flights.

3. Refund
The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

2. Travel Fund
Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.)

1. Free Rebooking 
Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR :

DG 6851/6852 Cebu – Siargao – Cebu

DG 6715/6716 Cebu – Cagayan de Oro – Cebu

5J 572 Cebu – Manila

Here are the cancelled flights:

Flight Number Route

5J 2510 Cebu – Manila

DG 6416/6417 Cebu – Iloilo – Cebu
Cebu Pacific has cancelled flights on October 25 because of the runway closure at the Mactan airport due to a disabled aircraft of an international airline.

Cebu Pacific Advisory #5

Cancelled flights on Oct 25 due to runway closure in Cebu

October 24, 2022, 5:00PM https://t.co/iluIqn8jHN

data.text: @bulek24 I'm sorry to hear this Nerie. Please do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser. For mobile app, ensure that version is updated.
